General.Name: BioPharma Credit PLC
General.Description: BioPharma Credit PLC, an investment trust, primarily invests in interest-bearing debt assets. Its debt assets are secured by royalties or other cash flows derived from the sales of approved life sciences products. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 51 New North Road, Exeter, United Kingdom, EX4 4EP
